short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tailwind Color Picker allows you to pick a pixel from any web page and return the closest tailwind color.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension will calculate the closest Tailwind color in any website you open it in so you can quickly prototype.
